website_summaries.verdict: This lamp offers a stylish choice at an affordable price tag. With its dimmable control and attractive stand, it adds ambiance and warmth to any room.
pros: A good value for those considering a salt lamp
It stands out for its attractive design and calming light
cons: It tends to shed a small amount of salt
Some users also had issues with burnt-out bulbs

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Okay... I waited a few weeks to write a review to see if this lamp made a difference in my home. I can clearly feel an improvement in the environment. I am a person with high anxiety and stress... I feel a calmness now. I like the dimmer switch cause at night I turn it down and it emits a soft glow while during the day I turn it up and it has a nice shine. I will be purchasing another one for my bedroom. I recommend you to try this lamp and for the price it couldn't hurt. I give this two thumbs up and five stars...
customer_reviews.author: Marla Jo

customer_reviews.title: Love, love love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: Love,love love this lamp. It is perfectly natural looking and the benefits to health are astounding. We leave it on all the time. It is in our bedroom so the dimmer switch is perfect for lowering the light while we sleep and it is perfect as a night light. I love that the ionizing benefits can still be at work when we are out.
customer_reviews.author: Di R.

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty. Decent size so it doesn't look like a ...
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty. Decent size so it doesn't look like a toy. Lights warm glow in the room. Get it for that. Don't buy the hype about it cleaning the air of toxins or whatever. Air purifiers work much better, but not much. You're better off changing out your HVAC filter frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing light and healthy atmosphere.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted for my office. I'm not a scientist but the lamp has made my office a better place to work. It seems my allergies have decreased Mt burning eyes and the blurriness has almost disappearedgepridexxx@yahoo.com
customer_reviews.author: GW Galloway

customer_reviews.title: I find the soft orange glow to be relaxing and also a great night light
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these lamps. One for myself and one for my wife. I find the soft orange glow to be relaxing and also a great night light. My wife claims that it seems to help her sleep and also gives her some joint relief. I would have to say we are completely satisfied and I found the shipping to be what it was supposed to be. (timely and undamaged)
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Hymalayan salt lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love this salt lamp! It has where you can adjust the brightness. It looks nice in the room.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect home accent
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these now. I absolutely love them.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Salt Lamps
customer_reviews.text: Loved the salt lamps . Really liked that they have a dimmer switch. Got 3 lamps for Myself. One for bedroom,familyroom and living room. Great value also . Gave one as a gift to My Daughter and she loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bulb didn't work. Received two cords two bulbs. Tried to remove defective bulb and it burst in friends face. Wire around bulb was corroded. Salt will corroded wire. Asked for replacement, company requested picture of items already thrown away, before they would replace.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Gardner

customer_reviews.title: I love this lamp I especially like that it has a ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp I especially like that it has a dimmer switch. It has a nice glow to it and it exceeded my expectation as far as guality goes. It is really a nice lamp for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with the lamp
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the lamp. The dimmer switch is also a great feature. I use this lamp in the bedroom and it is perfect for creating a soft glow to see by. Changing the bulb is easy.
customer_reviews.author: R. Buffington

customer_reviews.title: Low price is not worth the hassle
customer_reviews.text: The lamp arrived without the knob which turns increases/decreases the intensity of the light.The light still functioned, so no big deal. I turned the light on and the bulb blew after about 12 minutes. I attempted to replace the bulb, but the new bulbs aren't working, so the lamp is now non functional. Do yourself a favor and don't buy this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Unsworth

customer_reviews.title: Love this but there was not orange light
customer_reviews.text: Love this but there was not orange light.....it is awesome to have in your home. calming and soft. we use it for night light too

customer_reviews.title: Great salt lamp

customer_reviews.title: This has been a great addition to my "all natural" lifestyle

The lamp comes with a dial type switch for turning on and off and dimming the light, however the first time I turned it it fell off. I just took a small amount of epoxy glue and stuck it back on and it seems to be OK.

Very disappointed with this product.

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice little light
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice little light. The light is 6-7" tall and perfect for my headboard. As some of mentioned, you can switch the 15w bulb that it comes with for a night light bulb. I used a 4w bulb which still gives off a little warmth. They say the warmth heats up the salt. If it weren't for that, I would have used a 0.5w led night light bulb. I don't know about all the health benefits that they claim, but its a nice looking piece which gives off some nice calming pink light. I've been turning it on when watching TV in my room just for a little bit of light without the glare.

customer_reviews.title: Love this light
customer_reviews.text: Love this light. It was a good size and puts off a good glow as well. As many others, I did receive it broken as well. A wire in the dimmer switch was not connected properly. Not wanting too hassle sending it back, we were able to fix the problem pretty easily at home. But overall I am very satisfied with this product.

product_meta.title: AMSkart Himalayan Crystal Salt Lamp Natural Shape with Dimmer Switch and Wooden Base, 6.5 - 7.5 Inch, 3 - 6 lbs
product_meta.description:
WHAT IS IN THE BOX


 Unique hand carved salt lamp
6 ft Power cord with dimmable switch
15 Watt light bulb
wooden base
manual user guide

Note:
Each lamp is packed in individual Retail box 

 Hand-Crafted Natural Shape Salt Lamp Provides a Soft Glow
Totally natural, hand-crafted product. rough, unfinished surface and the crystal's rough-hewn, irregular surface looks pink. it gives a warm amber glow. You can even change the color of the bulb to give a different hue to the lighting area. Use the lamp as a gentle nightlight, to create a romantic mood or replacement of candle light in dinner provides a natural touch.

 ENHANCE LIFE, NATURAL AIR PURIFIER & IONIZER
As the bulb enlightened salt lamp emits a calming amber color & after gets heated the salt crystal start releasing negative ions into the air. Thus it creats an effect of ionizer by purifying the surrounding air. Due to the effect of the negative ions on the body blood and oxygen supply to the brain and other organs gets improved. This will enhance your mood and help you relax.

 Reduce Allergy & Asthma Symptoms
People with asthma often find it helpful in reducing their symptoms. Salt lamps remove polluted particles of dust, smoke and the like from the surrounding air. By putting lamps in the living and bed rooms you can see remarkable cut back on allergy and asthma symptoms after a week or two.

 FIND COOL, UNUSUAL, NATURAL GIFT FOR ANY OCCASION
Expensive gifts aren't always the best gifts. Sometimes giving a ""simple"" present that touches will work.

ENVIRONMENTALLY-FRIENDLY LIGHT SOURCE - with 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE & HASSLE FREE RETURN."
feature_bullets: UNIQUE HAND MINED & HANDMADE LAMP - Himalayan Rock Salt Lamps are originated and hand mined in the Himalayan mountains. Due to the natural variation in Himalayan crystal salt weight, size, color and shape may vary
ENHANCE LIFE, NATURAL AIR PURIFIER & IONIZER - As the bulb enlightened salt lamp emits a calming amber color and negative ions thus it creates an effect of ionizer
GET BETTER SLEEP PATTERN - removes all POLLUTING PARTICLES - take fresh breath without polluted particles like dust, pollen, cigarette smoke etc from the air
FIND COOL, UNUSUAL, NATURAL GIFT FOR ANY OCCASION - Expensive gifts aren't always the best gifts. Sometimes giving a "simple" present that touches will work
ENVIRONMENTALLY-FRIENDLY LIGHT SOURCE - with 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE & HASSLE FREE RETURN

specifications.Special Features: Dimmable Cord, 100% Satisfaction, Wooden Polished Base, Moneyback Warranty, User Manual Guide, Each lamp will be a unique piece - no two are ever the same - varying in size, shape and color., Outstanding Customer Service, Hassle-Free Return, Hand Chipped Salt Stone
specifications.Shade Color: Varying in color naturally. Pink, Light Pink, Orange, Light Orange, Red
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars261 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
